title: Frim: get new friends on local chat rooms
description:
Frim helps you to connect with new people around. You can make new friends, meet new local people for a coffee while you travel or just chat with interesting people online.
Discover, chat and have a lot of fun with new friends!
- Meet new people and get new friends fast - just shout: I am looking for new friends or just say Hi! And get tons of new friendship requests from people in your area!
- If you are single, looking for relationship or want to find a true love - meet, communicate, talk, flirt and maybe date with someone. It’s up to you!
- Use a powerful messenger: unlimited text, voice, photo and group messages (up to 20 people in a group), typing and read marks, disappearing messages for free!
- Brighten your conversations with funny stickers and cool gifts
- Flick through and pick profiles you like
- Use filter to find someone of your age
- Express yourself with different badges
- Post your day-to-day thoughts in your feed
- Stay anonymous - just pick any nickname and start a new chat
Also you can use Frim like an alternative chat app for strangers. You can chat with unknown friends, with girls or boys, meet new people nearby or make foreign friends on local chatrooms (Megaphone) in USA and many other countries. Join our online party!
If you have any questions or suggestions feel free to contact us!
